notesStmt.note: This notebook includes a draft of lines written about Pfaff's, a popular mid-nineteenth century Bohemian spot. The lines were edited and published posthumously as "The Two Vaults." This notebook also contains notes about the Jamaica Presbyterian bicentennial which were used by Whitman in the article "Important Ecclesiastical Gathering at Jamaica, L.I.," published in the Brooklyn City News in January 1862.
